comments.author: sc230584@gmail.com
comments.creator: sc230584@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100517 Moblin/3.6.10-6.1 Firefox/3.6.10
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100517 Moblin/3.6.10-6.1 Firefox/3.6.10

The 'connection settings' window (Edit->Preferences->Advanced->Network->Settings) is oversized. The 'OK' button at the bottom is not visible in the screen. I am using firefox-3.6.10 on meego-1.0 . The screen geometry of netbook is 216x127 .  

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Goto Edit menu
2.Select Preferences option at the bottom
3.Select Advanced in Firefox Preferences
4.Select Network tab 
5.Click on Settings button to open Connection Settings
Actual Results:  
The screen extends beyond the lower screen limit.

Expected Results:  
The bigger window should either scale to screen size or should have scrollbars.

default theme.
